title: Brand needs a nerf.
body: Brand's way too op right now. His w deals too much dmg. His passive is just too op and stupid. Does anyone else think that Brand needs a nerf?

replies.body:
it is really annyoing that going full damage on supp is more worth than byung wards.
Your jungler needs to hard camp botlane of there is a brand as enemy supp.
Which seems easy enough since there are almost no wards... besides the control wards, which you cannot clear, because going into the river means death by brand.
So you need a jungler than can either gank from over the wall or lane bushes.

But to win that lane you need to get hard camp until the first turret is down, however...
In the mean time you might as well loose mid and toplane, because their jungler can ignore botlane.
Brand cannot really loose on botlane in a 2v2

I have problems with brand 'support', who can 100-0 you at lvl 3 with ignite. Or at least make you waste summs and back. No shield or heal support can counter his insane damage pre-6 laning phase, combined with his adc damage as well. The moment he walks in a bush- if its not already warded, you're probably dead.. You either die by trying to ward it or when you move an inch. Combined with his late game team damage... He needs to be looked at.
Either his CDs or mana costs need to go up, considering he is played mainly as support. I have never seen a Brand go OOM in lane. Considering they spam their stupid stuff all day long.
I'm sick of Brand supports. Like srsly?
His late game power is a little too strong in my opinion, but that is only with 4-6 items, other than that, his early game and mid game is alright{{champion:63}}
